title: Lambda to SES
description: Create a Lambda function that sends emails via SES.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The SAM template deploys a Lambda function with permission to send an email with Amazon SES.  Specify the Sender/Receiver email addresses and the Lambda function will send an email based on these parameters with Amazon SES.
